release.action: Ease requirements on fields to allow phantom QCs.
Increase robustness by not treating an error for a single session as fatal for the whole file.
Fixed XML output to use the system's image session ID (not the label) and to put the date and time before the imageSession_ID, per the schema.
Switched to nrg github account as primary location for project.
Updated column mappings according to latest file formats. Many fields now optional. sdate instead of timestamp. Session ID now "patid" instead of "patientid".Added rescan field.
Initial release. Includes ability to map CSV QC files into XML and upload that XML into an XNAT server.
